name: Space Out (WIP On Hold)
description:
This game is a WORK IN PROGRESS!!! Graphics, gameplay, and music are likely to change throughout development.

At least one controller is required to play this game. Preferably, use ONLY controllers to play.

Controller Controls (X-input, Xbox layout):

A - Fly

X - Attack

B - Back

D-Pad - Move/Turn

Keyboard Controls (Only use if ABSOLUTELY NECESSARY, these are still a WIP):

  • A - X Key
  • X - S Key
  • B - Z Key
  • D-Pad - UDLR Keys
  • Select - Right Shift
  • Start - Enter/Return
